GPUCommandEncoder.summary: The GPUCommandEncoder interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} represents an encoder that collects a sequence of GPU commands to be issued to the GPU.

remarks.para: A GPUCommandEncoder object instance is created via the property.

GPUCommandEncoderBeginComputePass.summary:
The beginComputePass() method of the
interface starts encoding a compute pass, returning a that can be used to control computation.

GPUCommandEncoderBeginRenderPass.summary:
The beginRenderPass() method of the
interface starts encoding a render pass, returning a that can be used to control rendering.

GPUCommandEncoderClearBuffer.summary:
The clearBuffer() method of the
interface encodes a command that fills a region of a with zeroes.

GPUCommandEncoderCopyBufferToBuffer.summary:
The copyBufferToBuffer() method of the
interface encodes a command that copies data from one to another.

GPUCommandEncoderCopyBufferToTexture.summary:
The copyBufferToTexture() method of the
interface encodes a command that copies data from a to a .

GPUCommandEncoderCopyTextureToBuffer.summary:
The copyTextureToBuffer() method of the
interface encodes a command that copies data from a to a .

GPUCommandEncoderCopyTextureToTexture.summary:
The copyTextureToTexture() method of the
interface encodes a command that copies data from one to another.

GPUCommandEncoderFinish.summary:
The finish() method of the
interface completes recording of the command sequence encoded on this GPUCommandEncoder, returning a corresponding .

GPUCommandEncoderInsertDebugMarker.summary:
The insertDebugMarker() method of the
interface marks a specific point in a series of encoded commands with a label.

remarks.para: This could be used for telemetry, or may be utilized in messages, browser dev tools, or other services in the future to help with debugging.

GPUCommandEncoderLabel.summary:
The label read-only property of the
interface is a string providing a label that can be used to identify the object, for example in messages or console warnings.

remarks.para: This can be set by providing a label property in the descriptor object passed into the originating call, or you can get and set it directly on the GPUCommandEncoder object.

GPUCommandEncoderLabel.value: A string. If no label value has previously been set, getting the label returns an empty string.

GPUCommandEncoderPopDebugGroup.summary:
The popDebugGroup() method of the
interface ends a debug group, which is begun with a call.

remarks.para: This could be used for telemetry, or may be utilized in messages, browser dev tools, or other services in the future to help with debugging.

GPUCommandEncoderPushDebugGroup.summary:
The pushDebugGroup() method of the
interface begins a debug group, which is marked with a specified label, and will contain all subsequent encoded commands up until a method is invoked.

remarks.para: This could be used for telemetry, or may be utilized in messages, browser dev tools, or other services in the future to help with debugging.

GPUCommandEncoderResolveQuerySet.summary:
The resolveQuerySet() method of the
interface encodes a command that resolves a , copying the results into a specified .

GPUCommandEncoderWriteTimestamp.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The writeTimestamp() method of the
interface encodes a command that writes a timestamp into a once the previous commands recorded into the same queued have been executed by the GPU.

blockquote.para: To use timestamp queries, the timestamp-query {{domxref("GPUSupportedFeatures", "feature", "", "nocode")}} must be enabled in the .
